actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Council on Wage and Price Stability Act to extend the authority granted by such Act to September 30, 1981, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Council on Wage and Price Stability Act to: (1) number of authorized GS-16, 17, and 18 level positions; (2) increase authorization of appropriations for fiscal year 1979 and to extend authorizations through fiscal year 1981; and (3) extend the authority of the Act to September 30, 1981.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Council on Wage and Price Stability Act to extend the authority granted by such Act to September 30, 1981, and for other purposes.
